entry.em: ..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING

entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
BLUSTERY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH IN THE EVENING

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
